creator: carlos@cvc.edu
text:
In trying to convert a specific file to PDF using FOP and the Docbook 
stylesheets, version 1.44 I get a never ending error loop that I have to stop 
using control-C. I've run xmllint and it does not detect any problem with the 
file. I've also attached the file to see if anyone can reproduce the problem 
and help me solve it

Created attachment 790
XML file that is not converting to PDF
creator: carlos@cvc.edu
j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
As the docbook xsl 1.44 appears to be no longer available, I had to use 1.45.
It is recommended to attach the generated FO file rather than the raw XML
to a bug report.
FOP 0.20.3 wont display the table generated by the revision history (a well
known problem), but the infinite loop appears to be fixed.

creator: carlos@cvc.edu
text:
Confirmed.  I've got it to work using Saxon 6.5.2 as the XSLT Processor 
and the 1.50.0 stylesheets
batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
